channel.title: Table/play pitch object out of tune?
channel.description: Hello, I'm having a problem with the table/play pitch object. It plays the samples slightly out of tune. In order to make sure I made some new samples with sine waves on C3 and C4. These samples read 130 and 261 Hz on the audio analyzer on audacity, but when I play them on the "table/play pitch" object they are at 126 and 255 Hz. This might not seem too big of a problem but playing it with other tuned stuff you can really tell it is out of tune. I have tweaked the pitch knob on the object and that is the closest I get to the original frequency. Does anyone have any idea on what can I be doing wrong? Here's a screenshot of the patch and subpatch I'm using, I'm trying to keep it as simple as I can trying to avoid mistakes. EDIT: Samples are in .raw format, exported with Audacity as RAW (header-less) Signed 16-bit PCM

item.title: Table/play pitch object out of tune?
item.dc:creator: @TTotelka
item.description:
@TTotelka wrote:

WOW ok, it was that, I had the samples at 44100 hz instead of 48000, I have just tried and I seem to be getting the frequency right :)))
Thanks @lokki!!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Table/play pitch object out of tune?

item.title: Table/play pitch object out of tune?
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

and you are at 48000 hz in audacity?

Read full topic

item.title: Table/play pitch object out of tune?
item.dc:creator: @TTotelka
item.description:
@TTotelka wrote:

Hello,
I'm having a problem with the table/play pitch object. It plays the samples slightly out of tune. In order to make sure I made some new samples with sine waves on C3 and C4.
These samples read 130 and 261 Hz on the audio analyzer on audacity, but when I play them on the "table/play pitch" object they are at 126 and 255 Hz.
This might not seem too big of a problem but playing it with other tuned stuff you can really tell it is out of tune.
I have tweaked the pitch knob on the object and that is the closest I get to the original frequency.
Does anyone have any idea on what can I be doing wrong?
Here's a screenshot of the patch and subpatch I'm using, I'm trying to keep it as simple as I can trying to avoid mistakes.

imagen.png1120x403 23.4 KB

EDIT: Samples are in .raw format, exported with Audacity as RAW (header-less) Signed 16-bit PCM
